biotools.summary: The Human Gene Mutation Database (HGMD) - comprehensive collection of germline mutations in nuclear genes that underlie, or are associated with, human inherited disease. It is a flexible resource that can be adapted to a broad range of applications including searching for an overview of known mutations associated with a particular disease, interpreting clinical test results or looking for the likely causal mutation in a list of variants.
